name: The Land of the Samurai
description:
A devastating event leads our main character to seek vengeance. In order to do so he needs to become a Samurai.

This is the first part of "The Land of the Samurai", a series of  13 consecutive maps all connected via portals. After playing this first map just enter the portal that brings you to the second map, and so on. Make sure to play them all!

W,A,S,D to walk

Spacebar to jump

Shift to run

Mouse to aim

Mouse button to fire
